instruction: Rearrange the given poem so that it reads as an English sonnet.
input:
Eyes of silver, with a heart of gold, 
You have no trouble being in the world,
In the word of freedom your love shines like a star, 
Your spirit leads me to wherever you are.
output:
Eyes of silver, with a heart of gold,
Your spirit leads me to wherever you are;
In the word of freedom your love shines like a star, 
You have no trouble being in the world.
